workspace.name: XMI2ESHR
workspace.query:
## query
# This shows use of SPARQL to query the employee reporting structure. This gives, for all employees, the boss and his/her reports. # Make sure to point your database to FINAL.
PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?boss ?report ?bossName ?reportName WHERE {?boss ^org:reportsTo+ ?report . ?boss rdfs:label ?bossName . ?report rdfs:label ?reportName .} order by ?boss

## query
# This shows use of SPARQL to find, for a given employee, the line of reports to the very top of the org. # Make sure to point your database to FINAL.
PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?boss WHERE {org:e998 org:reportsTo*/rdfs:label ?boss }
